Aww yeah! Today we're learning English with
Rick and Morty which is actually one of

my favorite new series that I've found
over the last couple of years.

Each episode takes some sort of complex
scientific theory or philosophy and

explains it in a simple but hilarious
way and in the scene that we've chosen

today you will learn some useful idioms
and vocabulary that natives commonly

use along with pronunciation that
you'll encounter in real life so let's
get into it!

So I know you're watching this lesson
because you get frustrated when you

can't understand natives, whether it's in
music TV series movies or even in real

life conversations and this hurts your
confidence, you're scared of actually
using your English in real life.

You want
to be able to confidently understand

natives in any situation just like your
mother tongue, right? Well this is exactly

why we created our fluent with friends
course our goal for you with this course

is to be able to learn the principles of
real native speech so that you can

understand natives no matter how fast we
speak and have a lot of fun doing it.

Now, in this 40 week course you will learn
alongside the first two seasons of the

TV series Friends with innovative tools
like power lessons vocabulary

memorization software and more and
you'll even get access to our global

community
English learners the Fluency Circle.

So do you want to try it? Well you can do
that for free with our three-part master

class all you have to do is click up
here or down the description below and

you can learn more and sign up for that
right now.
Hey if you're enjoying

learning with Rick and Morty then I bet
you will also really like this lesson

that we made a few weeks ago with
SpongeBob SquarePants you can find that

after you finish this video by clicking
up here or down in the description below.
All right did you laugh a ton

it's time to go beyond the classroom and
